messages.content: please rewrite the following so that it sounds like a mediveial knight said it: You little punk...

You little punk, I'll have you know that I am the bravest of all the knights! I'll have you know that I have faced dragons and other fearsome creatures and have come out victorious! I am the bravest of all the knights and none shall stand before me!
can you change the word punk to something else that fits the time period and perserves the meaning?

You upstart, I'll have you know that I am the bravest of all the knights! I'll have you know that I have faced dragons and other fearsome creatures and have come out victorious! I am the bravest of all the knights and none shall stand before me!
